completion:
def make_a_pile(n):
    return [n + 2 * i for i in range(n)] if n % 2 == 1 else [n + 2 * i for i in range(n)]

def words_string(s):
    return [word.strip() for word in s.replace(',', ' ').split() if word.strip()]

def unique_digits(x):
    return sorted(num for num in x if all(int(d) % 2 != 0 for d in str(num) if d.isdigit()))

def by_length(arr):
    return [["One", "Two", "Three", "Four", "Five", "Six", "Seven", "Eight", "Nine"][x - 1] for x in sorted([x for x in arr if 1 <= x <= 9])][::-1] if arr else []

def count_nums(arr):
    return sum(1 for num in arr if sum(int(digit) for digit in str(abs(num))) > 0)
